info.name: Hugo
powers: Hugo was a bit shy at first, but is a very lovely cat
May need a little time to settle in a new home, but once he is comfortable, he is very friendly

info.name: Hazel
powers: Beautiful nature, will be a lovely family cat
Likes to be able to get into the sunshine
Preferably a home with other cats. She is also used to dogs in her environment.

info.name: Charlie
powers: Another cat company would help her settle in her new home
Charlie needs an experienced onwer who has time to work with her and gain her trust
Lovely companion once has settled down

info.name: Aspey
powers: Aspey loves to play and has the sweetest face
He is vocal, and adores a brush from time to time
Aspey needs an experienced onwer, as he can be a little unsure of himself at times
Prefers a home without kids or dogs, but goes well with other cats

info.name: Tabitha
powers: Tabitha is a bit shy at first, but a lovely company
She would like to be the only cat in her new home
It will be very rewarding to watch her progress as she transitions from shyness to relaxed and content
